    • Constructor Detail

      • Node

        public Node​(java.lang.Integer id,
            java.lang.Long n,
            java.lang.Double R,
            java.lang.Double mu_w_exc,
            java.lang.Double mu_w_inh,
            java.lang.Double sigma_w_exc,
            java.lang.Double sigma_w_inh,
            java.lang.Double w_pre_exc,
            java.lang.Double w_pre_inh,
            java.lang.Integer k,
            java.lang.Double prew,
            java.lang.Integer Bn,
            java.lang.Double IBI,
            java.lang.Boolean plasticity,
            java.lang.Double etap,
            java.lang.Double etam,
            java.lang.Double taup,
            java.lang.Double taum,
            java.lang.Double pwMax,
            java.lang.Double to)
        The Node object
        Parameters:
        id - the node id
        n - the number of neurons of the node
        R - the ratio of excitatory neurons over the total number of neurons 'n'
        mu_w_exc - the mean of the postsynaptic weight distribution for excitatory neurons
        mu_w_inh - the mean of the postsynaptic weight distribution for inhibitory neurons
        sigma_w_exc - the std deviation of the postsynaptic weight distribution for excitatory neurons
        sigma_w_inh - the std deviation of the postsynaptic weight distribution for inhibitory neurons
        w_pre_exc - the presynaptic weight for excitatory neurons
        w_pre_inh - the presynaptic weight for inhibitory neurons
        k - the conn-degree of each neuron
        prew - the prob of small-world topology rewinig
        Bn - the number of bursts spike for each firing neuron
        IBI - the burst inter-spike time
        plasticity - simulate neuron plasticity
        etap - the Etap for plasticity
        etam - the Etam for plasticity
        taup - the Taup for plasticity
        taum - the Taum for plasticity
        pwMax - the pwMax for plasticity
        to - the to for plasticity
